comment:
>>46535611
“I ask of you a way to summon the Obsidian Pegasi wherever I please, such that ebony wings might lift me to starry heights.”

> [[ Those that laud the potential of Man forget it is scarcely achieved by Man alone. ]]
> [[ To tame great beasts once hunted, and fight alongside them in battle… ]]
> [[ Is this the Hunter’s dream? ]]
> [[ Seek five of our artifacts, and you might once again see the true Sky. ]]

“I wish to hold the ebb and flow of eternity in my own hand. To move and shape it to the benefit of my allies, and to the detriment of those who mean me harm.”

> [[ Your cause is noble, Entombed. ]]
> [[ But you too may be swept away by the tides of time. ]]
> [[ The forces you describe are not so easily mastered. ]]
> [[ No less than six of our gifts will grant this power. ]]

[[ 1 ]]
> Message someone.
> Wait for Ayla to return.

[[ 2 ]]
> Interact with the Celestial Altar.
> Write-in.
name: BSO
